001.name: CrewOne
001.text: All the panels seem to be working now.

002.name: CrewOne
002.text: We will be able to restore the power in a moment.

005.name: CrewOne
005.text: There she goes. Power is restored now.

006.name: CrewOne
006.text: Thank you so much for your help!

007.name: Robot
007.text: Let’s return to the Commander and report our progress.
